content: About Me a rce note blog
title: About

content: hugo下载 https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo 下载的是 hugo_extended版本，支持 scss/sass等语法
title: 博客搭建过程

content: 博客初始化 使用的是LoveIt主题 hugo new site blog cd blog git init git submodule add https://github.com/dillonzq/LoveIt themes/LoveIt echo "theme = 'LoveIt'" >> hugo.toml
title: 博客搭建过程

content: 新版hugo v0.136.2使用loveit主题报错修复 ERROR deprecated: hugo.IsMultilingual was deprecated in Hugo v0.124.0 and will be removed in Hugo 0.137.0. Use hugo.IsMultilingual instead. 替换相关文件的内容 .Sites.Default -> .Sites.Default hugo.IsMultilingual -> hugo.IsMultilingual .Site.Author -> .Site.Params.author
title: 博客搭建过程

content: 新建文档 hugo new posts/blog_init.md hugo new posts/blog_init.en.md
title: 博客搭建过程
